column4: hello can someone help me, I have set up a mail server and it recives ok through pop but wont send through smpt even though the support is there, i used telnet and it is there but when i use a mail client to sen it says stuff about an invalid transaction
have you tried seeking help from people who wrote the mta you are using?
they should have an irc channel, I think your problem has something to do with a config somewhere
